title: Jamaicans take shelter as Hurricane Melissa bears down as category 5 storm
description: Landfall is not expected until Tuesday but high winds have already felled trees and caused power cuts on the island
content:
Jamaicans have started to take shelter from Hurricane Melissa as high winds topple trees and cause power cuts before the category 5 storm makes landfall on Tuesday.
The slow-moving giant, the strongest hurricane to hit Jamaica since records began in ... [6639 chars]

title: Ed Miliband says £1.1bn a year to be set aside for new offshore wind projects
description: Final budget could rise if ministers see value for money, as industry lobby group says investment not enough
content:
The energy secretary, Ed Miliband, has set aside £1.1bn a year for offshore wind power developers investing in new projects, in the latest funding round aimed at meeting the UK’s green electricity targets.
The government’s energy department said toda... [3116 chars]

title: King Charles lays flowers at national memorial to LGBT armed forces veterans
description: Monument honours those whose careers were cut short by the ‘gay ban’ in place from 1967 to 2000
content:
The king has laid flowers at the UK’s first national memorial commemorating LGBT armed forces and met veterans who spoke of the trauma inflicted by the military’s former “gay ban”.
Charles was joined by dozens of serving and former members of the arm... [4087 chars]

title: ‘Gross failure’ led to deaths of mother and baby in Prestwich home birth
description: Jennifer Cahill and her daughter, Agnes Lily, died in birth described by coroner as ‘a Victorian-age nightmare’
content: When Jennifer Cahill went into labour with her second child at home in summer last year, she thought that the delivery, assisted by two midwives and with her husband by her side, would be a relatively simple one. Within 24 hours, however, she was dea... [6884 chars]
